title: Swift Industries Capstone Handlebar Bag
content:
Swift Industries just announced the Capstone Handlebar Bag. Designed to fit between the hoods of drop bar bikes, this 4 liter, rider-opening bag mounts directly to your bike’s handlebars. It features a structured lid and ripstop drawstring closure that keeps your contents safe and secure. The main body compartment is lined with foam padding to keep your gear quiet and protected when the road gets rough. MOLLE compatible webbing on the side panels allows for attachment of accessory bags like the Sidekick Stem Pouch or Rando pocket, and a daisy chain on the front is ideal for lashing a pump.

Check out more at Swift Industries.
